availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Campbell (Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant)

body.p: Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, merchant. Native of Ireland. Married to Grizzilda Campbell. Father of Mary Campbell. Merchant in Lexington, Fayette County, Kentucky, in 1860. Employed William Lowery and Jane Atkins as salespeople in Lexington in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fayette County, Lexington, p. 426.
"William Campbell (1821-1895)," Find A Grave, Memorial 100078140, accessed May 30, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/100078140.
